A good vvife Gods gift and, a vvife indeed. Tvvo mariage sermons. By Thomas Gataker B. of D. and pastor of Rotherhith. Gataker, Thomas, 1574-1654. Gataker, Thomas, 1574-1654. Two mariage sermons.
[8], 24, [4], 67, [1] p.
Printed by Iohn Hauiland for Fulke Clifton, London : 1623.
The first sermon is reprinted from "Two mariage sermons" by Gataker and William Bradshaw. "A vvife indeed" (caption title) has separate pagination; register is continuous. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======

[8], 24, [4], 67, [1] p.
Printed by Iohn Hauiland for Fulke Clifton, London : 1623.
The first sermon is reprinted from "Two mariage sermons" by Gataker and William Bradshaw. "A vvife indeed" (caption title) has separate pagination; register is continuous. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
